page.syntax: Arc_Tangent_Angle as N = ATAN2(N x,N y)
page.description: Returns an arc tangent angle (in radians) for all four quadrants
page.discussion: ATAN2() returns the arc tangent (in radians) for all four quadrants. With this function, you specify the X and Y coordinates, as opposed to specifying the tangent value, as is the case with the ATAN function.
